fleet-lotus_seeds.name: Fleet-Lotus Seeds
fleet-lotus_seeds.description: The plant that bears these seeds grows near deep water. The roots draw nutrients from the water, which boosts your movement speed when the seeds are cooked into a dish.

hydromelon.name: Hydromelon
hydromelon.description: This resilient fruit can flourish even in the heat of the desert. The hydrating liquid inside provides a cooling effect that, when cooked, increases your heat resistance.

palm_fruit.name: Palm Fruit
palm_fruit.description: Fruit from palm trees that grow near the ocean. It doesn't offer any special effects but will increase your heart recovery when used as an ingredient.

mighty_bananas.name: Mighty Bananas
mighty_bananas.description: This fruit grows mainly in tropical forests of the Faron region. When it's used as an ingredient, the resulting dish will temporarily increase your attack power.

spicy_pepper.name: Spicy Pepper
spicy_pepper.description: This pepper is exploding with spice. Cook with it to create dishes that will raise your body temperature and help you withstand the cold.

fortified_pumpkin.name: Fortified Pumpkin
fortified_pumpkin.description: An extremely tough pumpkin raised for food. When cooked, that toughness manifests itself by considerably upping defense.

hylian_tomato.name: Hylian Tomato
hylian_tomato.description: A fruit found widely from cold areas to warm climates. Full of nutrition, and kind of trendy lately. Use it in cooking to recover more hearts.

sun_pumpkin.name: Sun Pumpkin
sun_pumpkin.description: A new variety of pumpkin that soaks up the sunshine in Hateno Village. Baked into a dish, it can help heal the effects of exposure to gloom.

golden_apple.name: Golden Apple
golden_apple.description: A rare, very sweet fruit that seems to have an extra sparkle to it. Sometimes found near normal apples.

razorclaw_crab.name: Razorclaw Crab
razorclaw_crab.description: This crab is well known for its exceptionally sharp pincers. When cooked, the strength compound in its claws will increase your attack power.

ironshell_crab.name: Ironshell Crab
ironshell_crab.description: This crab's shell is particularly hard. When cooked into a dish, its fat and meat bolster the body to increase your defense.

bright-eyed_crab.name: Bright-Eyed Crab
bright-eyed_crab.description: This crab appears in large numbers when it rains. One bite of its delectable meat, and you'll forget all your exhaustion. Replenishes your stamina when cooked into a dish.

rushroom.name: Rushroom
rushroom.description: A mushroom that can grow almost anywhere but prefers ceilings and sheer cliffs. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your movement speed.

brightcap.name: Brightcap
brightcap.description: A mushroom that grows in caves and contains luminescent enzymes. Cook it into a dish to give a glowing effect to anyone who eats it.

stamella_shroom.name: Stamella Shroom
stamella_shroom.description: A nutritious mushroom chock-full of natural energy. Cook it to release its stamina-restoration properties.

chillshroom.name: Chillshroom
chillshroom.description: Often found at the base of pine trees in cold climates, these mushrooms are cool to the touch and can be used to cook dishes that allow you to stay cool even in arid regions.

sunshroom.name: Sunshroom
sunshroom.description: A bright-red mushroom that grows in hot climates. Imbued with the power of heat,  it can be used to cook dishes that will allow you to endure the bitter cold.

hylian_shroom.name: Hylian Shroom
hylian_shroom.description: A common mushroom found near trees around Hyrule. Eat it to restore half a heart.

hearty_truffle.name: Hearty Truffle
hearty_truffle.description: This rare mushroom has a rich scent. It'll restore all your hearts and temporarily increase your maximum hearts when used in cooking.

zapshroom.name: Zapshroom
zapshroom.description: This mushroom grows wild in the Gerudo region. The cap is naturally insulated, so when used in cooking, it will offer protection against electricity.

silent_shroom.name: Silent Shroom
silent_shroom.description: A strange mushroom that glows softly in the forest at night. Cooking it into a dish unlocks the nutrients in its cap, resulting in a meal that will allow you to move stealthily.

razorshroom.name: Razorshroom
razorshroom.description: This mushroom is known for the natural slice in its cap. Eating it fosters your competitive spirit. Use it when cooking to prepare a dish that will increase your strength.

ironshroom.name: Ironshroom
ironshroom.description: The cap of this mushroom is very hard. Use it when cooking to prepare a dish that increases your defense.

big_hearty_truffle.name: Big Hearty Truffle
big_hearty_truffle.description: Years of going unpicked have allowed this hearty truffle to grow quite large. When cooked into a dish, it'll restore all hearts and temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

endura_shroom.name: Endura Shroom
endura_shroom.description: A rare yellowish-orange mushroom. Cook it before eating to temporarily increase your stamina limit.

skyshroom.name: Skyshroom
skyshroom.description: A common mushroom that grows near trees on sky islands. Eat it to restore health.

hyrule_herb.name: Hyrule Herb
hyrule_herb.description: This healthy herb has not changed since ancient times. Cook it before eating to increase the number of hearts it restores.

hearty_radish.name: Hearty Radish
hearty_radish.description: A rare radish that grows best in sunny plains. Cook it before eating to restore all your hearts and temporarily increase your maximum hearts.

big_hearty_radish.name: Big Hearty Radish
big_hearty_radish.description: This hearty radish is much larger than the average radish. When cooked into a dish, it restores all your hearts and temporarily increases your maximum hearts.

cool_safflina.name: Cool Safflina
cool_safflina.description: This medicinal plant grows in high elevations, such as mountains in the Hebra or Gerudo regions. When cooked into a dish, it will temporarily increase your heat resistance.

warm_safflina.name: Warm Safflina
warm_safflina.description: This medicinal plant grows in hot regions, such as the Gerudo Desert. It's warm to the touch and increases your cold resistance when cooked into a dish.

mighty_thistle.name: Mighty Thistle
mighty_thistle.description: This medicinal plant is known for its sharp thorns and for the fruit it bears. The fruit contains a compound that increases attack power when cooked into a dish.

armoranth.name: Armoranth
armoranth.description: This tough medicinal plant cannot be broken, but it can be cooked. Its durable yet flexible fibers raise your defense when cooked into a dish.

blue_nightshade.name: Blue Nightshade
blue_nightshade.description: A plant that grows in quieter areas of Hyrule. At night, it gives off a soft glow. Cook with it to increase your stealth.

silent_princess.name: Silent Princess
silent_princess.description: This lovely flower was said to have been a favorite of the princess of Hyrule. They were once feared to have gone extinct, but it's not uncommon to spot them growing in the wild.

electric_safflina.name: Electric Safflina
electric_safflina.description: This medicinal plant grows abundantly in the Gerudo Desert. Its peculiar fibers conduct electricity, which will increase your electricity resistance when cooked into a dish.

swift_carrot.name: Swift Carrot
swift_carrot.description: This carrot is cultivated extensively in villages. It strengthens the legs and hips when cooked into a dish, which helps increase your movement speed.

swift_violet.name: Swift Violet
swift_violet.description: This vitality-rich flower blooms mainly on cliffsides. When cooked into a dish, the nourishing compounds increase your movement speed.

endura_carrot.name: Endura Carrot
endura_carrot.description: Highly valued as a medicinal plant, this carrot contains large amounts of nourishing energy. When cooked into a dish, it boosts your stamina beyond its maximum limit.

sundelion.name: Sundelion
sundelion.description: A wild plant that grows in the sun at high altitudes. Soaked in sunlight, its petals can restore health depleted by gloom when used in cooking.

stambulb.name: Stambulb
stambulb.description: A wild plant with bulging roots often found in cooler climates. It contains nutrients that increase endurance. Cook it to restore stamina.

korok_frond.name: Korok Frond
korok_frond.description: A mysterious leaf that looks like it might be hiding something behind it. It has some medicinal value. Attach it to a stick and it can be used as a fan.

giant_brightbloom_seed.name: Giant Brightbloom Seed
giant_brightbloom_seed.description: A seed that's found underground. When struck, it will take root and bloom, radiating a large amount of light from a big flower.

brightbloom_seed.name: Brightbloom Seed
brightbloom_seed.description: A seed that's often found in caves or wells. When struck, it will take root and bloom, giving off faint light from a small flower.

dazzlefruit.name: Dazzlefruit
dazzlefruit.description: A fruit charged with powerful light. Break it to unleash dazzling sparkles that blind any monsters nearby.

arrow.name: Arrow
arrow.description: A common arrow. Its shaft was carved from the wood of a sturdy tree.

ore_deposit.name: Ore Deposit
ore_deposit.description: This deposit contains a good deal of ore. Breaking the rock will yield rock salt, flint, and other ore and minerals of varying value.

rare_ore_deposit.name: Rare Ore Deposit
rare_ore_deposit.description: This deposit contains a good deal of precious ore and the occasional rare mineral, like ruby and sapphire. Break it open to see what it has to offer!

luminous_stone_deposit.name: Luminous Stone Deposit
luminous_stone_deposit.description: This deposit contains quite a bit of luminous stone. Crack it open to get at the easily processed rocks within.

zonaite_deposit.name: Zonaite Deposit
zonaite_deposit.description: This deposit glows with mysterious energy and is very common in the Depths. If you crack it open, you can claim the zonaite within.

puffshroom.name: Puffshroom
puffshroom.description: A mushroom that spreads a cloud of fine spores when a stimulus is applied. The bitter powder makes them inedible.

treasure_chest.name: Treasure Chest
treasure_chest.description: Fortunes untold (potentially) await the lucky adventurer who finds one of these. Chests can often be found within shrines or at enemy camps, but there may be some crafty folks who think they're safer underground.

splash_fruit.name: Splash Fruit
splash_fruit.description: A fruit that contains pressurized water. Cooking it brings out its ability to enhance swim speed when ingested.

traveler's_bow.name: Traveler's Bow
traveler's_bow.description: A small bow used by travelers for protection. It doesn't do a lot of damage, but it can be used to attack foes from a distance.

soldier's_bow.name: Soldier's Bow
soldier's_bow.description: A bow designed for armed conflict. Inflicts more damage than a civilian bow, but it will still burn if it touches fire.

spiked_boko_bow.name: Spiked Boko Bow
spiked_boko_bow.description: An upgraded Boko bow bound with animal bone to boost its durability and firepower. Its craftsmanship is sloppy, but it's light and easy to use.

boko_bow.name: Boko Bow
boko_bow.description: A basic Bokoblin bow made of wood. It's made by taking any tree branch and just tying a string to either end, so don't expect much in the way of combat effectiveness.

lizal_bow.name: Lizal Bow
lizal_bow.description: A wooden bow created by Lizalfos. It's reinforced by the bones of a large fish— a marked improvement over any standard wooden bow.

lynel_bow.name: Lynel Bow
lynel_bow.description: A Lynel-made bow crafted from rough metal. True to the vicious nature of Lynel weaponry, it fires a spread of multiple arrows at once. Ideal for taking down quick-moving targets.

strengthened_lizal_bow.name: Strengthened Lizal Bow
strengthened_lizal_bow.description: A Lizal bow with a grip reinforced by metal. The body is made from the branches of a flexible tree that grows near water, which offers some serious destructive power.

forest_dweller's_bow.name: Forest Dweller's Bow
forest_dweller's_bow.description: The Koroks made this bow for Hylians. It's crafted from flexible wood and uses sturdy vines for the bowstring. Its construction may be simple, but it fires multiple arrows at once.

zora_bow.name: Zora Bow
zora_bow.description: A bow favored by the Zora for fishing. It doesn't boast the highest firepower, but the special metal it's crafted from prioritizes durability.

gerudo_bow.name: Gerudo Bow
gerudo_bow.description: This Gerudo-made bow is popular for the fine ornamentations along its limbs. Designed for hunting and warfare alike, this bow was engineered to strike distant targets.

swallow_bow.name: Swallow Bow
swallow_bow.description: This bow is a favorite among Rito warriors. The bowstring has been specially engineered for aerial combat, which allows it to be drawn faster than a normal bow.

falcon_bow.name: Falcon Bow
falcon_bow.description: A highly refined Rito-made bow created by a master Rito craftsman. Rito warriors favor it for its superior rate of fire, which helps them excel even further at aerial combat.

mighty_lynel_bow.name: Mighty Lynel Bow
mighty_lynel_bow.description: This massive Lynel bow sports a bowstring made from a metal so tough, mere Hylians have trouble drawing it back.

dragonbone_boko_bow.name: Dragonbone Boko Bow
dragonbone_boko_bow.description: A Boko bow reinforced by fossils. Bokoblins handpicked the materials it's made from, so it boasts a respectable firepower.

great_eagle_bow.name: Great Eagle Bow
great_eagle_bow.description: A bow without equal wielded by the Rito Champion, Revali. It's said Revali could loose arrows with the speed of a gale, making him supreme in aerial combat.

phrenic_bow.name: Phrenic Bow
phrenic_bow.description: A bow passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Concentrating before drawing the string will allow you to target distant enemies as easily as those nearby.

steel_lizal_bow.name: Steel Lizal Bow
steel_lizal_bow.description: This bow is wielded by Lizalfos who are expert marksmen. The metal that reinforces much of the weapon adds some additional weight but offers heightened durability.

savage_lynel_bow.name: Savage Lynel Bow
savage_lynel_bow.description: This Lynel bow is made from a special steel found at the peak of Death Mountain. It has tremendous stopping power and can pierce thick armor as easily as thin paper.

royal_guard's_bow.name: Royal Guard's Bow
royal_guard's_bow.description: This prototype Sheikah-made bow was designed to fight the Great Calamity. Made with ancient technology, it boasts a high rate of fire and firepower but has low durability.

knight's_bow.name: Knight's Bow
knight's_bow.description: The sturdy metal construction of this bow offers superior durability, while its lack of firing quirks makes it quite reliable. Once favored by the knights at Hyrule Castle.

royal_bow.name: Royal Bow
royal_bow.description: In the past, the king of Hyrule presented this bow to only the most talented archers in the land. Its combat capabilities are as impressive as its extravagant design.

wooden_bow.name: Wooden Bow
wooden_bow.description: This wooden bow may not be the most reliable for battling monsters, but it is excellent for hunting small animals.

duplex_bow.name: Duplex Bow
duplex_bow.description: A bow favored by the skilled archers of the Yiga Clan. It's been engineered to fire two arrows at once to ensure your target comes to a swift and none-too-pleasant halt.

dusk_bow.name: Dusk Bow
dusk_bow.description: A bow that's been in the royal family for ages. Said to have been used by a princess who fought beasts of twilight. It forcefully fires long-range arrows.

zonaite_bow.name: Zonaite Bow
zonaite_bow.description: A Zonai bow that draws power from your Energy Cell. Power drains, and arrows can fly much farther according to how long a shot is charged.

construct_bow.name: Construct Bow
construct_bow.description: A bow used by a Captain Construct. Though simply built, it is made of fireproof materials and won't catch fire as wooden bows do.

strong_construct_bow.name: Strong Construct Bow
strong_construct_bow.description: A sturdy bow for a Captain Construct. Besides being fireproof, it's been strengthened to allow for more powerful shots.

mighty_construct_bow.name: Mighty Construct Bow
mighty_construct_bow.description: A powerful bow for a Captain Construct. Though still fireproof, it's more complex than earlier models. The bowstring is extremely tense and requires great strength to draw.

old_wooden_bow.name: Old Wooden Bow
old_wooden_bow.description: A wooden bow from the olden days. It's built for hunting, but it's not very powerful.

demon_king's_bow.name: Demon King's Bow
demon_king's_bow.description: A magical bow prized by the Demon King. Its performance reflects the power of its wielder. The higher your maximum number of hearts, the more its attack power increases.

traveler's_claymore.name: Traveler's Claymore
traveler's_claymore.description: A basic two-handed sword once wielded by aspiring adventurers. It's decayed and no longer cuts well, but it can still knock a shield right out of enemies' hands.

soldier's_claymore.name: Soldier's Claymore
soldier's_claymore.description: A lightweight metal weapon forged for royal soldiers. It's decayed now, but still easy to wield, so it consumes less stamina during charge attacks.

knight's_claymore.name: Knight's Claymore
knight's_claymore.description: A claymore, now decayed, once carried by knights of Hyrule. It resonates with the desire to protect at all costs and can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.

moblin_arm.name: Moblin Arm
moblin_arm.description: A Moblin bone that continues to move even after being detached from its body. The bone is thick enough to be used as a weapon but is extremely brittle and easily broken.

rusty_claymore.name: Rusty Claymore
rusty_claymore.description: A two-handed sword not properly cared for. Although it can be used as a weapon, its durability is very low. Don't expect it to last for more than a few strikes.

royal_claymore.name: Royal Claymore
royal_claymore.description: A large sword, now decayed, issued to the royal family's guard. It's tuned for skilled users and yields a powerful flurry rush during a perfect dodge.

zora_longsword.name: Zora Longsword
zora_longsword.description: A decayed Zora longsword, it's suited for battles near water because it's made of an unusual metal that increases attack power when it's wet.

gerudo_claymore.name: Gerudo Claymore
gerudo_claymore.description: A two-handed Gerudo sword with a decayed blade. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.

cobble_crusher.name: Cobble Crusher
cobble_crusher.description: In its former state, this hefty weapon knocked out many a foe. Decayed, it still packs a punch and is great for breaking rocks.

boat_oar.name: Boat Oar
boat_oar.description: Made for paddling boats, but it was made sturdy enough to fight strong currents. Maybe it's useful for self-defense in a pinch.

eightfold_longblade.name: Eightfold Longblade
eightfold_longblade.description: A longblade that no longer cuts as well as it once did, due to its decayed edge. However, when wielded by a proficient fighter, it cleaves the wind and creates a vacuum.

farming_hoe.name: Farming Hoe
farming_hoe.description: A farming tool primarily used for tilling fields. Its fine craftsmanship is sturdy enough to withstand backbreaking fieldwork, but its battle applications are untested.

royal_guard's_claymore.name: Royal Guard's Claymore
royal_guard's_claymore.description: A decayed claymore prototype for the royal guard. It's made of a metal refined using an unusual method, and it holds massive destructive power just before it breaks.

giant_boomerang.name: Giant Boomerang
giant_boomerang.description: A massive boomerang that is weathered and decayed. It was originally used for hunting, but it can be a challenge to wield. Thrown well, it will come back to the thrower.

boulder_breaker.name: Boulder Breaker
boulder_breaker.description: This two-handed weapon was once wielded by the Goron Champion Daruk. Daruk made swinging it around look easy, but a Hylian would need an immense amount of strength.

dusk_claymore.name: Dusk Claymore
dusk_claymore.description: A slender claymore thought to have been handed down to the kingdom of Hyrule ages ago. The blade shines with a holy luster.

biggoron's_sword.name: Biggoron's Sword
biggoron's_sword.description: A legendary greatsword forged by a Goron craftsman for a hero who traveled through time. The exceptionally sharp cutting edge is a testament to the craftsman's mastery.

fierce_deity_sword.name: Fierce Deity Sword
fierce_deity_sword.description: A peculiar greatsword allegedly used by a hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. It slashes wildly in battle as if possessed by a Fierce Deity.

zonaite_longsword.name: Zonaite Longsword
zonaite_longsword.description: A large sword used by the Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to slightly increase its attack power.

thick_stick.name: Thick Stick
thick_stick.description: A stick cut off from a large tree. It isn't very sturdy, but its heavier end can swat a shield away.

sturdy_thick_stick.name: Sturdy Thick Stick
sturdy_thick_stick.description: A solid stick cut from the crooked branch of a tough tree. It has high durability, despite the way it looks.

gnarled_thick_stick.name: Gnarled Thick Stick
gnarled_thick_stick.description: A stick cut from a tree trunk. It's been dried to increase its hardness. It has high attack power for something made of wood.

magic_scepter.name: Magic Scepter
magic_scepter.description: A long and mysterious magical rod, it's said to have been wielded by an ancient magician who awoke the latent power of gems.

strong_zonaite_longsword.name: Strong Zonaite Longsword
strong_zonaite_longsword.description: A strong, large sword used by the Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to increase some of its attack power.

mighty_zonaite_longsword.name: Mighty Zonaite Longsword
mighty_zonaite_longsword.description: A powerful, large sword used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack power.

gloom_club.name: Gloom Club
gloom_club.description: A metal stick filled with madness and symbolic of doom. Its forceful strike can smash an object to pieces. Its gloom will gradually wear down the body of its wielder.

wooden_shield.name: Wooden Shield
wooden_shield.description: This lightweight, simple shield is ideal for less experienced fighters. It can withstand light attacks, but blocking stronger blows is not recommended.

soldier's_shield.name: Soldier's Shield
soldier's_shield.description: A shield once used by the guards of Hyrule Castle. It's easy to handle, but its core is  made of wood, so it can catch fire.

knight's_shield.name: Knight's Shield
knight's_shield.description: A shield favored by the knights who served the Hyrulean royal family. Its sturdy metal construction makes it quite durable, but its weight requires decent skill to wield.

boko_shield.name: Boko Shield
boko_shield.description: A Bokoblin-made shield created by attaching a handhold to any flat tree bark picked up off the ground. It's pretty shoddy, so don't expect it to last very long.

spiked_boko_shield.name: Spiked Boko Shield
spiked_boko_shield.description: A Boko shield made of slightly stronger wood and reinforced with animal bones.

dragonbone_boko_shield.name: Dragonbone Boko Shield
dragonbone_boko_shield.description: This Boko shield is reinforced with fossilized bone. Its defensive capabilities are respectable, but its predictably slipshod craftsmanship spells low durability.

lizal_shield.name: Lizal Shield
lizal_shield.description: A common shield found among the Lizalfos. It's made of metal, but its sloppy craftsmanship offers poor durability.

reinforced_lizal_shield.name: Reinforced Lizal Shield
reinforced_lizal_shield.description: This Lizal shield has been strengthened by adding a different type of metal to the mix. The edge is lined with spikes, so handle with care.

steel_lizal_shield.name: Steel Lizal Shield
steel_lizal_shield.description: This Lizal shield is adorned with several metal shells as a means of reinforcement. Its defensive capabilities are high, but its weight requires a skilled soldier to bear.

lynel_shield.name: Lynel Shield
lynel_shield.description: A sturdy shield favored by Lynels for its defensive and offensive capabilities. First and foremost a shield, but the bladed edges can deal slashing attacks when deflecting.

mighty_lynel_shield.name: Mighty Lynel Shield
mighty_lynel_shield.description: This Lynel-made shield has been reinforced with armor and even more blades. Stronger in both defense and offense, it can tear through basic armor when deflecting.

savage_lynel_shield.name: Savage Lynel Shield
savage_lynel_shield.description: This ultimate Lynel shield is favored by the White-Maned Lynels. It excels at defending against even the most brutal of attacks and cutting down powerful foes when deflecting.

rusty_shield.name: Rusty Shield
rusty_shield.description: It's likely this rusty old shield once belonged to a knight. It still has some defensive capabilities, but its usefulness has been worn down by time.

royal_shield.name: Royal Shield
royal_shield.description: A shield issued to the Hyrulean royal family's immediate guard detail. It boasts a high defense, but these days it's more a collector's item due to its ornamentation.

forest_dweller's_shield.name: Forest Dweller's Shield
forest_dweller's_shield.description: The Koroks made this shield specifically for Hylians. It's made from the finest hard wood of trees that grow only in Korok Forest, so it's sturdier than it looks.

zora_shield.name: Zora Shield
zora_shield.description: A Zora-made shield adorned with intricate ornamentation. It's said that true masters of this shield can redirect attacks as a rock redirects rushing water.

gerudo_shield.name: Gerudo Shield
gerudo_shield.description: The design of this metal shield has changed over time to match the Gerudo's sword-and-shield fighting style. It's favored by soldiers and travelers alike.

hylian_shield.name: Hylian Shield
hylian_shield.description: A shield passed down through the Hyrulean royal family, along with the legend of the hero who wielded it. Its defensive capabilities and durability outshine all other shields.

hunter's_shield.name: Hunter's Shield
hunter's_shield.description: Favored by hunters for its rabbit design, which is said to bring luck on hunts. It's easy to use, but its durability leaves something to be desired.

fisherman's_shield.name: Fisherman's Shield
fisherman's_shield.description: Often carried by fishermen for its fish design, which represents hope for a great catch. Its light wooden construction makes it convenient to take onto a boat.

royal_guard's_shield.name: Royal Guard's Shield
royal_guard's_shield.description: This shield was forged using ancient Sheikah technology. It boasts extremely high stopping power, but its structural weakness made its low durability impractical for combat.

emblazoned_shield.name: Emblazoned Shield
emblazoned_shield.description: This shield features a traditional design from Necluda. Its combat capabilities aren't much better than the standard wooden shield, but it found popularity for its design.

traveler's_shield.name: Traveler's Shield
traveler's_shield.description: A sturdy shield loved by many an adventurer. It is made of animal hide and sturdy wood and is best suited to defending against weak monsters or animals.

radiant_shield.name: Radiant Shield
radiant_shield.description: This extravagant shield is presented to Gerudo warriors who rise to the rank of captain. Its apparent opulence is rivaled only by its combat capabilities.

daybreaker.name: Daybreaker
daybreaker.description: This shield was cherished by the Gerudo Champion Urbosa. The gold used to make it was handpicked to ensure a design that is both lightweight and very durable.

pot_lid.name: Pot Lid
pot_lid.description: The lid of a large soup pot. It smells vaguely of poultry broth... Yum! It can take quite a beating before breaking.

shield_of_the_mind's_eye.name: Shield of the Mind's Eye
shield_of_the_mind's_eye.description: A small Sheikah-made shield. Its design is intended to decrease blind spots without sacrificing too much defense.

kite_shield.name: Kite Shield
kite_shield.description: Rito warriors cherish this shield. Its unique shape is designed with midbattle flight in mind to facilitate aerial combat.

sea-breeze_shield.name: Sea-Breeze Shield
sea-breeze_shield.description: A shield said to have been the favorite of a hero who traveled the open seas. It was apparently a family heirloom, passed down through many generations.

zonaite_shield.name: Zonaite Shield
zonaite_shield.description: A shield used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It lowers the energy consumption of an attached Zonai device.

strong_zonaite_shield.name: Strong Zonaite Shield
strong_zonaite_shield.description: A shield used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It is moderately durable and lowers the energy consumption of an attached Zonai device.

mighty_zonaite_shield.name: Mighty Zonaite Shield
mighty_zonaite_shield.description: A shield used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It is very durable and draws on its stored energy to more efficiently use an attached Zonai device.

old_wooden_shield.name: Old Wooden Shield
old_wooden_shield.description: An aged, worn-out wooden shield. It can withstand lighter attacks, such as arrows.

traveler's_spear.name: Traveler's Spear
traveler's_spear.description: An average spear carried by travelers for protection. It's decayed and doesn't cut well, but the shape makes it easy for anyone to handle.

soldier's_spear.name: Soldier's Spear
soldier's_spear.description: Although now decayed, this lightweight metal spear was made for royal soldiers. Because it's light and easy to handle, it enables quicker charged attacks.

knight's_halberd.name: Knight's Halberd
knight's_halberd.description: Now decayed, this halberd was made for knights of Hyrule. It reflects their courage in defending the kingdom. It can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.

rusty_halberd.name: Rusty Halberd
rusty_halberd.description: A rusty polearm likely used by knights from an age past. The spearhead is in bad shape due to prolonged exposure to the elements, so its durability is low.

farmer's_pitchfork.name: Farmer's Pitchfork
farmer's_pitchfork.description: A farming tool used to collect hay efficiently. It's light enough to be used by anyone. The four prongs are very sharp.

royal_halberd.name: Royal Halberd
royal_halberd.description: Although now decayed, this spear was once given to knights who guarded critical areas of Hyrule Castle. It enables a powerful flurry rush during a perfect dodge.

forest_dweller's_spear.name: Forest Dweller's Spear
forest_dweller's_spear.description: A Korok spear with a decayed tip. It's still full of vitality. Bursting materials attached to the spearhead can be reused again and again.

zora_spear.name: Zora Spear
zora_spear.description: A Zora spear with a decayed point. It's made of a water-resistant metal and yields a high attack power when it gets wet.

gerudo_spear.name: Gerudo Spear
gerudo_spear.description: A Gerudo spear with a decayed blade that is designed to draw force to its tip. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.

throwing_spear.name: Throwing Spear
throwing_spear.description: A spear for throwing with a decayed tip. Lost its sharpness, but kept the balance perfect for throwing, enabling you to throw it very far.

feathered_spear.name: Feathered Spear
feathered_spear.description: A spear used by Rito soldiers, its point is now decayed. It still boasts quick attacks in midair, and it produces a strong wind.

wooden_mop.name: Wooden Mop
wooden_mop.description: Just a mop to the untrained eye, it excels at tidying up the place. But it owes its sturdy construction to a true craftsman, so it actually has some combat merit.

fishing_harpoon.name: Fishing Harpoon
fishing_harpoon.description: A fisherman's tool that excels at catching large fish. Its particularly sharp spearhead makes it valuable as a weapon as well.

royal_guard's_spear.name: Royal Guard's Spear
royal_guard's_spear.description: A prototype spear wielded by knights. It's made from a special metal with low durability, but which yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.

lightscale_trident.name: Lightscale Trident
lightscale_trident.description: A spear of peerless grace cherished by the Zora Champion Mipha. Although Mipha specialized in healing abilities, her spearmanship was in a class all its own.

zonaite_spear.name: Zonaite Spear
zonaite_spear.description: A Zonai spear made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to slightly increase its attack power.

long_stick.name: Long Stick
long_stick.description: A long stick fashioned from a tree branch. Its straight shape makes it work well as a lunging weapon.

sturdy_long_stick.name: Sturdy Long Stick
sturdy_long_stick.description: A long, durable stick made from a branch with good piercing power. It has high durability because it comes from the hardest part of the tree.

gnarled_long_stick.name: Gnarled Long Stick
gnarled_long_stick.description: A long stick made bumpy at one end when its shoots were cut off. It has higher attack power than a normal stick.

magic_staff.name: Magic Staff
magic_staff.description: A long rod with a bit of magic, it's said to have been wielded by an ancient magician who awoke the latent power of gems.

strong_zonaite_spear.name: Strong Zonaite Spear
strong_zonaite_spear.description: A tough spear used by the Zonai. It is highly durable. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to increase some of its attack power.

mighty_zonaite_spear.name: Mighty Zonaite Spear
mighty_zonaite_spear.description: A powerful Zonai spear made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack power.

gloom_spear.name: Gloom Spear
gloom_spear.description: A spear whose ominous appearance strikes fear into hearts. It is said to cost its bearer a part of their soul because its gloom will gradually wear down the body of its wielder.

traveler's_sword.name: Traveler's Sword
traveler's_sword.description: An average sword used largely by travelers. The blade has decayed, but it can still serve its purpose.

soldier's_broadsword.name: Soldier's Broadsword
soldier's_broadsword.description: A light, thin metal sword used by the guards of Hyrule Castle. Its light weight makes it easy to handle and enables quicker charged attacks.

knight's_broadsword.name: Knight's Broadsword
knight's_broadsword.description: Knights of Hyrule once carried this sword. Even in its decayed state, it shows its true resolve in desperation and can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.

bokoblin_arm.name: Bokoblin Arm
bokoblin_arm.description: A skeletal arm that keeps moving even after it's severed from its body. It's kind of gross to strap it to your back, but it'll do in a pinch. It's old and fragile, so it's quick to break.

lizalfos_arm.name: Lizalfos Arm
lizalfos_arm.description: The arm of a Stalizalfos that continues to struggle even in death. It can be used as a weapon, but it's very brittle. You can feel it wiggling when you strap it to your back...

rusty_broadsword.name: Rusty Broadsword
rusty_broadsword.description: This once-fearsome sword has seen better days. It can do some damage in the right hands but also breaks quickly.

soup_ladle.name: Soup Ladle
soup_ladle.description: A kitchen implement often used for serving delicious soups. It was carved from the wood of a sturdy tree, so it actually packs quite the wallop.

royal_broadsword.name: Royal Broadsword
royal_broadsword.description: A sword gifted to accomplished knights by the royal family. Crafted for sword masters, it increases the power of flurry rush during perfect dodge.

forest_dweller's_sword.name: Forest Dweller's Sword
forest_dweller's_sword.description: A living, wooden Korok sword with a decayed blade. Bursting materials attached to the tip can be reused again and again.

zora_sword.name: Zora Sword
zora_sword.description: A long Zora sword with a decaying blade. Made of a metal favored by the Zora, it yields a high attack power when it gets wet.

gerudo_scimitar.name: Gerudo Scimitar
gerudo_scimitar.description: A decaying scimitar from the Gerudo region, it is designed for maximizing force. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.

feathered_edge.name: Feathered Edge
feathered_edge.description: A double-edged Rito sword with a decayed blade. Swinging it produces a strong wind.

eightfold_blade.name: Eightfold Blade
eightfold_blade.description: A single-edged sword of the Sheikah tribe.  Its small blade, now decayed, is suited for covert actions and yields more powerful sneakstrikes than ordinary blades.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: This torch will stay lit once ignited, but if you put it away, the flame will be extinguished until you light it again.

tree_branch.name: Tree Branch
tree_branch.description: Wooden branches such as this are pretty common, but it's surprisingly well-balanced. It doesn't do much damage but can serve as a weapon in a pinch.

royal_guard's_sword.name: Royal Guard's Sword
royal_guard's_sword.description: A prototypical sword for knights. Its metal may not be as durable as others, but the sword yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.

boomerang.name: Boomerang
boomerang.description: A decayed wooden boomerang. A useful tool that comes back after you throw it. Its current state has not lessened its performance.

scimitar_of_the_seven.name: Scimitar of the Seven
scimitar_of_the_seven.description: A famous sword once beloved by the Gerudo Champion Urbosa. It is said that when Urbosa swung this sword in battle, her movements resembled a beautiful dance.

white_sword_of_the_sky.name: White Sword of the Sky
white_sword_of_the_sky.description: A sword said to have once belonged to a hero from the sky. Its beautiful white blade stands out. When it's wielded, a strange yet heavenly breeze kicks up around you.

sword_of_the_hero.name: Sword of the Hero
sword_of_the_hero.description: A sword once wielded by a hero in an ancient age. When it's grasped, a strange sense of nostalgia washes over you. Take it when going alone would otherwise be dangerous.

sea-breeze_boomerang.name: Sea-Breeze Boomerang
sea-breeze_boomerang.description: A boomerang said to have been used by a hero who traveled the Great Sea. It smells faintly of salt water.

master_sword.name: Master Sword
master_sword.description: The legendary sword that seals the darkness. Its corruption was healed by its time with the Light Dragon. The blade gleams with a sacred luster that can oppose the Demon King.

zonaite_sword.name: Zonaite Sword
zonaite_sword.description: A Zonai sword made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to slightly increase its attack power.

wooden_stick.name: Wooden Stick
wooden_stick.description: A tree branch with an added grip and excellent balance. Equip it, and use it as a weapon.

lizal_boomerang.name: Lizal Boomerang
lizal_boomerang.description: A curved sword favored by the Lizalfos. It's made of metal so it can safely be used near fire. If you throw it, it will return to you.

sturdy_wooden_stick.name: Sturdy Wooden Stick
sturdy_wooden_stick.description: A stick made out of a hard tree branch. The tree soaked up lots of sunshine, so it's sturdier than a regular stick and has high durability.

gnarled_wooden_stick.name: Gnarled Wooden Stick
gnarled_wooden_stick.description: A very swingable stick made by honing a dried branch to the proper thickness and length. Its attack power is much greater than that of a normal stick.

magic_rod.name: Magic Rod
magic_rod.description: A small and intensely magic rod, it's said to have been wielded by an ancient magician who awoke maximum latent power in gems.

strong_zonaite_sword.name: Strong Zonaite Sword
strong_zonaite_sword.description: A strong Zonai sword made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to increase some of its attack power.

mighty_zonaite_sword.name: Mighty Zonaite Sword
mighty_zonaite_sword.description: A powerful sword used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack power.

gloom_sword.name: Gloom Sword
gloom_sword.description: This slender sword has an ominous presence. It is said to end the life of anyone it touches. Its gloom will gradually wear down the body of its wielder.

mushroom_skewer.name: Mushroom Skewer
mushroom_skewer.description: This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal.

steamed_mushrooms.name: Steamed Mushrooms
steamed_mushrooms.description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.

steamed_fruit.name: Steamed Fruit
steamed_fruit.description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.

steamed_fish.name: Steamed Fish
steamed_fish.description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.

steamed_meat.name: Steamed Meat
steamed_meat.description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.

fruit_and_mushroom_mix.name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
fruit_and_mushroom_mix.description: This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms.

fish_and_mushroom_skewer.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
fish_and_mushroom_skewer.description: A simple dish made by cooking skewered fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.

meat_and_mushroom_skewer.name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
meat_and_mushroom_skewer.description: A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with meat.

omelet.name: Omelet
omelet.description: This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump.

glazed_mushrooms.name: Glazed Mushrooms
glazed_mushrooms.description: The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish.

glazed_meat.name: Glazed Meat
glazed_meat.description: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile.

glazed_seafood.name: Glazed Seafood
glazed_seafood.description: A seafood dish that you can actually wolf down whole!

glazed_veggies.name: Glazed Veggies
glazed_veggies.description: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!

fried_wild_greens.name: Fried Wild Greens
fried_wild_greens.description: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

simmered_fruit.name: Simmered Fruit
simmered_fruit.description: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.

fish_skewer.name: Fish Skewer
fish_skewer.description: A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer.

meat_skewer.name: Meat Skewer
meat_skewer.description: A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer.

copious_fried_wild_greens.name: Copious Fried Wild Greens
copious_fried_wild_greens.description: A healthy dish made by cooking mixed greens over a strong flame.

copious_simmered_fruit.name: Copious Simmered Fruit
copious_simmered_fruit.description: The flavors of the various fruits in this simmered dish exist in perfect harmony.

copious_mushroom_skewers.name: Copious Mushroom Skewers
copious_mushroom_skewers.description: Fans of fungal cuisine can't resist this simple mushroom-skewer dish. Very filling.

copious_seafood_skewers.name: Copious Seafood Skewers
copious_seafood_skewers.description: It's just a whole heap of stuff shoved onto a skewer, but it's still a pretty tasty dish.

copious_meat_skewers.name: Copious Meat Skewers
copious_meat_skewers.description: Just shove a bunch of meat onto a skewer, and you're good to go.

meat_and_seafood_fry.name: Meat and Seafood Fry
meat_and_seafood_fry.description: A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together.

prime_meat_and_seafood_fry.name: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
prime_meat_and_seafood_fry.description: This comfort dish is made with choice cuts of meat and seafood.

gourmet_meat_and_seafood_fry.name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
gourmet_meat_and_seafood_fry.description: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!

meat-stuffed_pumpkin.name: Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
meat-stuffed_pumpkin.description: This hollow, meat-filled pumpkin is a local specialty of Kakariko Village.

sautéed_peppers.name: Sautéed Peppers
sautéed_peppers.description: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.

sautéed_nuts.name: Sautéed Nuts
sautéed_nuts.description: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!

seafood_skewer.name: Seafood Skewer
seafood_skewer.description: A skewer of delicious roasted fish and shellfish.

fairy_tonic.name: Fairy Tonic
fairy_tonic.description: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

salt-grilled_mushrooms.name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
salt-grilled_mushrooms.description: A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them.

salt-grilled_greens.name: Salt-Grilled Greens
salt-grilled_greens.description: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.

salt-grilled_fish.name: Salt-Grilled Fish
salt-grilled_fish.description: A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it.

salt-grilled_meat.name: Salt-Grilled Meat
salt-grilled_meat.description: Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish.

salt-grilled_prime_meat.name: Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
salt-grilled_prime_meat.description: A simple yet exquisite dish made by grilling high-quality meat on top of rock salt.

salt-grilled_gourmet_meat.name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
salt-grilled_gourmet_meat.description: This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat.

pepper_steak.name: Pepper Steak
pepper_steak.description: The meat has been cooked in crushed peppers to accent its natural taste.

pepper_seafood.name: Pepper Seafood
pepper_seafood.description: The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma.

salt-grilled_crab.name: Salt-Grilled Crab
salt-grilled_crab.description: Nine out of ten fishermen agree crab is best enjoyed grilled and with just a bit of salt.

crab_stir-fry.name: Crab Stir-Fry
crab_stir-fry.description: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of its meat.

poultry_pilaf.name: Poultry Pilaf
poultry_pilaf.description: Sautéed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy.

prime_poultry_pilaf.name: Prime Poultry Pilaf
prime_poultry_pilaf.description: The rice permeates the savory taste of the poultry in this Gerudo-region favorite.

gourmet_poultry_pilaf.name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf
gourmet_poultry_pilaf.description: Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.

fried_egg_and_rice.name: Fried Egg and Rice
fried_egg_and_rice.description: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.

creamy_meat_soup.name: Creamy Meat Soup
creamy_meat_soup.description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly braised meat and many vegetables.

creamy_seafood_soup.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
creamy_seafood_soup.description: Thick-cut chunks of seafood and stock provide a satisfying savoriness.

veggie_cream_soup.name: Veggie Cream Soup
veggie_cream_soup.description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.

creamy_heart_soup.name: Creamy Heart Soup
creamy_heart_soup.description: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.

seafood_rice_balls.name: Seafood Rice Balls
seafood_rice_balls.description: Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.

veggie_rice_balls.name: Veggie Rice Balls
veggie_rice_balls.description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.

mushroom_rice_balls.name: Mushroom Rice Balls
mushroom_rice_balls.description: The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping.

meat_and_rice_bowl.name: Meat and Rice Bowl
meat_and_rice_bowl.description: This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule.

prime_meat_and_rice_bowl.name: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
prime_meat_and_rice_bowl.description: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat. Your hunt for a serious meal ends here.

gourmet_meat_and_rice_bowl.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl
gourmet_meat_and_rice_bowl.description: Only the most carefully selected cuts of high- quality meats go into this dish.

seafood_fried_rice.name: Seafood Fried Rice
seafood_fried_rice.description: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!

curry_pilaf.name: Curry Pilaf
curry_pilaf.description: The Goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.

mushroom_risotto.name: Mushroom Risotto
mushroom_risotto.description: The tantalizing aroma of mushrooms and butter beckons you to the table.

vegetable_risotto.name: Vegetable Risotto
vegetable_risotto.description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.

salmon_risotto.name: Salmon Risotto
salmon_risotto.description: The rice used in this rich risotto permeates the light flavor of the salmon.

meaty_rice_balls.name: Meaty Rice Balls
meaty_rice_balls.description: The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time.

crab_omelet_with_rice.name: Crab Omelet with Rice
crab_omelet_with_rice.description: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.

crab_risotto.name: Crab Risotto
crab_risotto.description: An everyday staple of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.

seafood_meunière.name: Seafood Meunière
seafood_meunière.description: Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.

porgy_meunière.name: Porgy Meunière
porgy_meunière.description: Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish.

salmon_meunière.name: Salmon Meunière
salmon_meunière.description: The crispy skin of this fried hearty salmon puts its texture in a class all its own.

fruit_pie.name: Fruit Pie
fruit_pie.description: A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!

apple_pie.name: Apple Pie
apple_pie.description: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.

egg_tart.name: Egg Tart
egg_tart.description: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.

meat_pie.name: Meat Pie
meat_pie.description: You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat.

carrot_cake.name: Carrot Cake
carrot_cake.description: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.

pumpkin_pie.name: Pumpkin Pie
pumpkin_pie.description: The intense sweetness of pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.

hot_buttered_apple.name: Hot Buttered Apple
hot_buttered_apple.description: The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it.

honeyed_apple.name: Honeyed Apple
honeyed_apple.description: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.

honeyed_fruits.name: Honeyed Fruits
honeyed_fruits.description: A dish that combines the thick sweetness of honey with the acidity of sour fruits.

plain_crepe.name: Plain Crepe
plain_crepe.description: The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine.

wildberry_crepe.name: Wildberry Crepe
wildberry_crepe.description: Sweet, tart wildberries are folded into thin, springy dough to make this dessert.

nutcake.name: Nutcake
nutcake.description: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.

fried_bananas.name: Fried Bananas
fried_bananas.description: Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat.

egg_pudding.name: Egg Pudding
egg_pudding.description: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth.

fish_pie.name: Fish Pie
fish_pie.description: A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor.

honey_candy.name: Honey Candy
honey_candy.description: A natural sweet, brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.

honey_crepe.name: Honey Crepe
honey_crepe.description: Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor.

curry_rice.name: Curry Rice
curry_rice.description: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.

vegetable_curry.name: Vegetable Curry
vegetable_curry.description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.

seafood_curry.name: Seafood Curry
seafood_curry.description: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.

poultry_curry.name: Poultry Curry
poultry_curry.description: The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry.

prime_poultry_curry.name: Prime Poultry Curry
prime_poultry_curry.description: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.

meat_curry.name: Meat Curry
meat_curry.description: The heat from the spice allows you to enjoy the large portion of the meat's savoriness.

prime_meat_curry.name: Prime Meat Curry
prime_meat_curry.description: The high-quality meat in this curry has given it a deeper taste than most other curries.

gourmet_poultry_curry.name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
gourmet_poultry_curry.description: Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality.

gourmet_meat_curry.name: Gourmet Meat Curry
gourmet_meat_curry.description: The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike.

meat_stew.name: Meat Stew
meat_stew.description: The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule.

prime_meat_stew.name: Prime Meat Stew
prime_meat_stew.description: Letting the large portions of choice cuts of meat simmer brought out their savoriness.

pumpkin_stew.name: Pumpkin Stew
pumpkin_stew.description: Simply simmer a pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village.

snail_chowder.name: Snail Chowder
snail_chowder.description: The pleasant texture and flavor of snails combine with butter and milk in a rich soup.

gourmet_meat_stew.name: Gourmet Meat Stew
gourmet_meat_stew.description: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!

cream_of_mushroom_soup.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
cream_of_mushroom_soup.description: This creamy mushroom-and-vegetable soup is thick and flavorful.

cream_of_vegetable_soup.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
cream_of_vegetable_soup.description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as its ingredients.

carrot_stew.name: Carrot Stew
carrot_stew.description: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.

milk.name: Milk
milk.description: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.

monster_stew.name: Monster Stew
monster_stew.description: Meat and seafood simmered in monster extract. A savory dish despite its ingredients.

monster_soup.name: Monster Soup
monster_soup.description: Using monster extract as a base, this soup's distinct gaminess is either loved or hated.

monster_cake.name: Monster Cake
monster_cake.description: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.

monster_rice_balls.name: Monster Rice Balls
monster_rice_balls.description: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.

monster_curry.name: Monster Curry
monster_curry.description: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely only on spices.

wheat_bread.name: Wheat Bread
wheat_bread.description: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.

seafood_paella.name: Seafood Paella
seafood_paella.description: No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish.

fruitcake.name: Fruitcake
fruitcake.description: Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations.

vegetable_omelet.name: Vegetable Omelet
vegetable_omelet.description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.

mushroom_omelet.name: Mushroom Omelet
mushroom_omelet.description: The fluffy texture of this omelet is one of the great joys of this dish, as well as life.

dubious_food.name: Dubious Food
dubious_food.description: It's too gross to even look at. A bizarre smell issues forth from this heap. Eating it won't hurt you though...probably.

rock-hard_food.name: Rock-Hard Food
rock-hard_food.description: A dish gone awry after adding the wrong ingredient. Chewing your way through this won't be fun, but it will fill you up when you're between a rock and a hard place.

fragrant_mushroom_sauté.name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté
fragrant_mushroom_sauté.description: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.

herb_sauté.name: Herb Sauté
herb_sauté.description: A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices. It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.

spiced_meat_skewer.name: Spiced Meat Skewer
spiced_meat_skewer.description: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine.

prime_spiced_meat_skewer.name: Prime Spiced Meat Skewer
prime_spiced_meat_skewer.description: The simple preparation of this steak dish belies its complex taste profile.

gourmet_spiced_meat_skewer.name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer
gourmet_spiced_meat_skewer.description: The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high- quality meat puts it in a league of its own.

simmered_tomato.name: Simmered Tomato
simmered_tomato.description: When simmered until tender, nutritious tomatoes can give this dish a sour kick.

fruity_tomato_stew.name: Fruity Tomato Stew
fruity_tomato_stew.description: A colorful dish, a bounty of fruit simmered with fresh tomatoes.

steamed_tomatoes.name: Steamed Tomatoes
steamed_tomatoes.description: Tomato cooked while wrapped in a leaf. The heat brings out its medicinal effect.

tomato_mushroom_stew.name: Tomato Mushroom Stew
tomato_mushroom_stew.description: A dish of fragrant mushrooms simmered with tomato. Healthy and rich in fiber.

tomato_seafood_soup.name: Tomato Seafood Soup
tomato_seafood_soup.description: Seafood simmered with tomato. Full of intense flavor.

cooked_stambulb.name: Cooked Stambulb
cooked_stambulb.description: A wild dish of a whole stambulb roasted with its skin on. Sweet and tasty.

buttered_stambulb.name: Buttered Stambulb
buttered_stambulb.description: A simple dish of stambulb sautéed with goat butter. Sweet with a hint of spice.

crunchy_fried_rice.name: Crunchy Fried Rice
crunchy_fried_rice.description: Hylian rice fried up with meat in high-quality oil. Each bite is packed with toasty flavor.

cheesecake.name: Cheesecake
cheesecake.description: A rich, moist, flavorful dessert with a Hateno cheese base.

cheesy_risotto.name: Cheesy Risotto
cheesy_risotto.description: Rich risotto made with fish or mushroom mixed with Hylian rice and Hateno cheese.

cheesy_omelet.name: Cheesy Omelet
cheesy_omelet.description: A satisfying dish with Hateno cheese poured over a tasty omelet.

veggie_porridge.name: Veggie Porridge
veggie_porridge.description: Porridge made of easy-to-digest vegetables, fresh milk, and Hylian rice. An uplifting dish.

noble_pursuit.name: Noble Pursuit
noble_pursuit.description: A popular fruit juice in Gerudo Town. Its tropical flavor will cheer you right up.

hylian_tomato_pizza.name: Hylian Tomato Pizza
hylian_tomato_pizza.description: A pizza made with fresh Hylian tomato. Slices of melty Hateno cheese make it irresistible.

fragrant_seafood_stew.name: Fragrant Seafood Stew
fragrant_seafood_stew.description: A tasty dish of seafood and stambulb cooked in oil. Its aroma will whet your appetite.

deep-fried_drumstick.name: Deep-Fried Drumstick
deep-fried_drumstick.description: A drumstick fried in high-quality oil. It's full of out-of-this-world flavor.

deep-fried_thigh.name: Deep-Fried Thigh
deep-fried_thigh.description: A deep-fried bird thigh so good, it's hard to take bites that aren't too big!

deep-fried_bird_roast.name: Deep-Fried Bird Roast
deep-fried_bird_roast.description: A deep-fried whole bird of the highest grade. It's a standard item in any celebratory feast.

melty_cheesy_bread.name: Melty Cheesy Bread
melty_cheesy_bread.description: Is there anything better than a simple slice of bread baked with Hateno cheese on top?

cheesy_baked_fish.name: Cheesy Baked Fish
cheesy_baked_fish.description: Fresh seafood delightfully accented with a generous serving of Hateno cheese.

cheesy_curry.name: Cheesy Curry
cheesy_curry.description: Curry with plenty of Hateno cheese, which balances the spiciness and urges seconds.

cheesy_meat_bowl.name: Cheesy Meat Bowl
cheesy_meat_bowl.description: A high-calorie dish with meat and plenty of cheese. A great dish for very hungry diners.

prime_cheesy_meat_bowl.name: Prime Cheesy Meat Bowl
prime_cheesy_meat_bowl.description: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat and cheese. A satisfying meal for any big eater.

gourmet_cheesy_meat_bowl.name: Gourmet Cheesy Meat Bowl
gourmet_cheesy_meat_bowl.description: Top-quality meat and cheese piled high. But can it satisfy the ultimate gourmand?

dark_stew.name: Dark Stew
dark_stew.description: A daring dish of dark clump stewed with meat and fish. What a surprise!

dark_rice_ball.name: Dark Rice Ball
dark_rice_ball.description: A bold rice ball made with dark clump and Hylian rice. Its flavor is unforgettable!

dark_soup.name: Dark Soup
dark_soup.description: A gooey soup built on stewed dark clump. One could get lost in its swirls and flavors.

dark_curry.name: Dark Curry
dark_curry.description: A hard-hitting curry with a dark-clump base, whose flavor is hard to hide.

dark_cake.name: Dark Cake
dark_cake.description: An unusual dark-clump cake with a unique flavor that may be impossible to fully describe.

cheesy_tomato.name: Cheesy Tomato
cheesy_tomato.description: A simple dish of Hylian tomato topped with delicious Hateno cheese. A perfect snack.
